你哩個case if over 18 應該係 indecent assult, http://www.mcs.com.hk/sexual-offences/

It can be either indictable or summary ~https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Criminal_procedure_in_Hong_Kong

如果 too trival on the facts, 就係summary. See the MTR example in http://www.mcs.com.hk/sexual-offences/

DOJ 唔會里你 beacuse it is time barred for a summary offence,
https://2www.clic.org.hk/en/topics/policeAndCrime/court_procedure/q2.shtml

Yet to prosecute as a indictable offence meant bringing the case to distric court. That would be too much work for DOJ(at least from DOJ's perspective)!

IF IT HAPPENED WHEN U WERE UNDER 18 THEN PLS CONTACT A LAWYER AND SEEK HELP!
